title: bA bA ranga
sahitya:
bA bA ranga bhujanga shayana kOmalAnga krpApAnga


anupallavi

  bA bA ennantaranga mallara gaja singa durita bhava bhanga


caraNam 1    ubaya kAvEriya madhya nivAsa abhaya dAyaka mandahAsa 
sabheyoLu satiyaLa kAyida ullAsa ibha varadena shrInivAsa
    caraNam 2    Elu prAkArada mALige maneyoLage kALiya dEvara dEva 
sOLa sAsira gOpiyarALida IrELu lOkada janakAva
    caraNam 3    candra puSkariNiya tIra vihAra indrAdi sura parivAra 
candrashEkaranuta nAda sukha sAndara suguNa gambhIra
    caraNam 4    rakSaNa trayagaLa dUSita nirata ashESa vibhava janapAla 
bhUSita nAnA vastrAbharaNa vibhISaNa kolida suprANa
    caraNam 5    shambarAriya pita Dambarahita mana ambujadaLa nibha nEtra 
kambu cakradhara purandara viTTala tumburu nArada krta stOtra
